feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Healthcare API
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Healthcare API

entry.content: The Healthcare Natural Language API is deprecated and will be shut down on May 27, 2026. For more information, see Deprecations.
entry.summary: The Healthcare Natural Language API is being deprecated and will be shut down on May 27, 2026. For more information, please refer to the deprecations page.
entry.title: Deprecated: Healthcare Natural Language API Deprecation
